Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: The Coupang AI (Artificial Intelligence) & Data Science students wondered about
relevantSources.summary: Coupang hosted an event for data science students showcasing AI technologies used in their fulfillment centers, including how AI predicts inventory needs and optimizes product placement through Random Stow method.

relevantSources.title: Coupang's astounding innovation powered by AI
relevantSources.summary: Video explaining how Coupang uses AI to manage its fulfillment centers, predicting order volumes and optimizing product placement and delivery routes.

relevantSources.title: Coupang is leading the future of commerce with AI innovation
relevantSources.summary: Video demonstrating how Coupang's AI innovation powers its commerce operations, analyzing customer trends and purchase patterns to manage inventory across national logistics centers.

relevantSources.title: Coupang in artificial intelligence: theme innovation strategy
relevantSources.summary: Report detailing Coupang's AI patents, including a system for generating and presenting product search results based on user's past purchase history using machine learning algorithms.

relevantSources.title: Accelerating Coupang's AI Journey with LLMs
relevantSources.summary: Video explaining how Coupang is using machine learning to optimize product search, pricing, inventory management, and logistics processing.

Transparency.findings: Coupang provides detailed public evidence of its AI systems, including how AI is used to optimize inventory, logistics, and product search. Multiple sources showcase specific AI techniques, patents, and operational transparency, demonstrating a robust commitment to sharing how AI underpins its business.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.justification: Score = 1 because 1 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Coupang search algorithm and KFTC fine | Sundaraparipurnan
relevantSources.summary: LinkedIn post discussing Coupang being fined $12.4 million for alleged manipulation of search algorithm, highlighting issues of algorithmic fairness in search results.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: There is public evidence of fairness and bias mitigation challenges in Coupang's AI, specifically regarding regulatory action on search algorithm bias. The regulatory fine and discussion provide concrete, verifiable information about fairness concerns and the company's exposure to bias-related issues.

Explainability.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: On-Demand Videos - Alluxio
relevantSources.summary: Webinar featuring Coupang's AI platform team discussing how they build and manage a large-scale AI platform for machine learning engineers to train models that enhance search and recommendation systems.

relevantSources.title: How Coupang Leverages Distributed Cache to Accelerate ML Model Training
relevantSources.summary: Presentation by Hyun Jung Baek, Staff Backend Engineer at Coupang, sharing best practices for leveraging distributed caching to power search and recommendation model training infrastructure.

relevantSources.title: (영문도서) Explainable AI Recipes: Implement Solutions to Model Explainability and Interpretability with... Paperback
relevantSources.summary: Book on Explainable AI sold on Coupang's platform, indicating awareness and interest in AI explainability techniques, though not direct evidence of Coupang's own explainability practices.

Explainability.findings: Coupang demonstrates engagement with explainability through technical presentations and webinars on AI platform design and model training. While one source is a book sold on their platform, the others provide concrete details on explainability practices in search and recommendation systems.

Human Oversight & Accountability.justification: Score = 0.5 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain only high-level principle statements.

relevantSources.title: Coupa AI Ethics White Paper -July 2024
relevantSources.summary: White paper discussing AI ethics including human oversight and monitoring, emphasizing the importance of human-in-the-loop interfaces when AI makes decisions and regular monitoring of AI performance.

relevantSources.title: (영문도서) Human-In-The-Loop Learning and Control for Robot Teleoperation Paperback
relevantSources.summary: Book on Human-In-The-Loop Learning and Control sold on Coupang's platform, indicating awareness of human oversight concepts in AI systems.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: There is only high-level evidence of human oversight and accountability for AI at Coupang. The references are either generic white papers (from a different company) or books sold on their platform, with no direct, detailed documentation of Coupang's own oversight mechanisms.

Privacy & Security.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Ethics Privacy Notice V.1.0 – Coupang! Privacy Notice Center(ENG)
relevantSources.summary: Coupang's privacy policy explaining how they protect personal information and handle ethics concerns in compliance with Korean privacy laws.

relevantSources.title: Coupang Fined Over 1.5 Billion Won for Major Data Breach Violations
relevantSources.summary: Article about Coupang being fined for violating safety measures and delaying notification of a personal information leak affecting delivery workers and customers.

Privacy & Security.findings: Coupang provides concrete evidence of privacy and security practices, including a dedicated privacy policy and public reporting on data breach incidents. These sources detail both compliance efforts and challenges in protecting personal and sensitive data.

Governance & Accountability.justification: Score = 0.5 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain only high-level principle statements.

relevantSources.title: Governance - Board of Directors - Coupang - Investor Relations
relevantSources.summary: Page detailing Coupang's board of directors structure, showing the governance framework that oversees company operations including technology initiatives.

relevantSources.title: Coupang announced on the 26th that it will switch from the existing...
relevantSources.summary: Article mentioning that CEO Park has led Coupang's AI logistics innovation and will now oversee overall management as the sole representative.

Governance & Accountability.findings: Coupang's governance disclosures are limited to high-level board structure and executive oversight, with no specific evidence of a formal AI governance office or responsible AI budget. The sources suggest general oversight but lack concrete details on AI-specific governance mechanisms.

Public Commitments & External Audits.justification: Score = 0.5 because 4 source(s) (listed below) contain only high-level principle statements.

relevantSources.title: Coupang Named a Fast Company Most Innovative Company for 2025
relevantSources.summary: Press release announcing Coupang's recognition as one of the World's Most Innovative Companies for 2025 by Fast Company, highlighting its AI innovations.

relevantSources.title: Coupang Named One of the "Most Innovative Companies of 2025"
relevantSources.summary: Article about Coupang being named among the "Top 100 Global Innovators for 2025" by LexisNexis, noting its patent portfolio is more than four times stronger than industry average.

relevantSources.title: Coupang Denies Possibility of Offshore Tax Evasion - Businesskorea
relevantSources.summary: Article about a tax investigation into Coupang by South Korea's National Tax Service, examining fund flows between domestic and overseas affiliates.

relevantSources.title: South Korea's tax authority launches non-regular special tax probe into Coupang
relevantSources.summary: Report on a special tax investigation into Coupang by South Korea's tax authority, coinciding with scrutiny from the Fair Trade Commission over algorithm manipulation allegations.

Public Commitments & External Audits.findings: Public commitments and external audits for Coupang are limited to high-level recognitions, tax investigations, and innovation awards. There is no direct evidence of AI-specific third-party audits, certifications, or formal signatory commitments to global AI frameworks.

summary.overallFindings: Coupang demonstrates strong transparency, fairness, explainability, and privacy practices, with multiple sources providing detailed and verifiable information on these pillars. However, evidence for human oversight, governance, and public commitments is limited to high-level statements or indirect references, indicating room for improvement in formalizing and disclosing responsible AI structures and external validation. Overall, Coupang's responsible AI efforts are robust in operational areas but less mature in governance and external accountability.
